title: A true history of a child anatomized, which remained twenty five years in his mothers belly with all those reflections which the phænomena of the same may explain : very serviceable and useful for all, especially physicians, chirurgeons, and midwives / by Nicolas de Blegny ... ; translated according to the approved and priviledged copy of Paris ; with copper plates.
author: Blégny, Monsieur de (Nicolas), 1652-1722.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Tho. James for Samuel Lee ...,
